   22: 
   23: -module(tls_1_3_version_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   27: %% Common test
   28: -export([all/0,
   29:          groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1,
   31:          init_per_group/2,
   32:          end_per_suite/1,
   33:          end_per_group/2
   34:         ]).
   35: 
   36: %% Test cases
   37: -export([tls13_client_tls12_server/0,
   38:          tls13_client_tls12_server/1,
   39:          tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server/0,
   40:          tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server/1,
   41:          tls12_client_tls13_server/0,
   42:          tls12_client_tls13_server/1,
   43:          tls_client_tls10_server/0,
   44:          tls_client_tls10_server/1,
   45:          tls_client_tls11_server/0,
   46:          tls_client_tls11_server/1,
   47:          tls_client_tls12_server/0,
   48:          tls_client_tls12_server/1,
   49:          tls10_client_tls_server/0,
   50:          tls10_client_tls_server/1,
   51:          tls11_client_tls_server/0,
   52:          tls11_client_tls_server/1,
   53:          tls12_client_tls_server/0,
   54:          tls12_client_tls_server/1,
   55:          legacy_tls12_client_tls_server/0,
   56:          legacy_tls12_client_tls_server/1,
   57:          legacy_tls12_server_tls_client/0,
   58:          legacy_tls12_server_tls_client/1,
   59:          middle_box_tls13_client/0,
   60:          middle_box_tls13_client/1,
   61:          middle_box_tls12_enabled_client/0,
   62:          middle_box_tls12_enabled_client/1,
   63:          middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused/0,
   64:          middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused/1,
   65:          renegotiate_error/0,
   66:          renegotiate_error/1
   67:         ]).
   68: 
   69: 
   70: %% Test callback
   71: -export([check_session_id/2]).
   72: 
   73: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   74: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   75: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   76: all() -> 
   77:     [
   78:      cert_groups()
   79:     ].
   80: 
   81: groups() ->
   82:     [
   83:      {rsa, [], tls_1_3_1_2_tests() ++ legacy_tests()},
   84:      {ecdsa, [], tls_1_3_1_2_tests()}
   85:     ].
   86: 
   87: cert_groups() ->
   88:     [{group, rsa},
   89:      {group, ecdsa}].
   90: 
   91: tls_1_3_1_2_tests() ->
   92:     [tls13_client_tls12_server,
   93:      tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server,
   94:      tls12_client_tls13_server,
   95:      tls_client_tls12_server,
   96:      tls12_client_tls_server,
   97:      legacy_tls12_client_tls_server,
   98:      legacy_tls12_server_tls_client,
   99:      middle_box_tls13_client,
  100:      middle_box_tls12_enabled_client,
  101:      middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused,
  102:      renegotiate_error
  103:     ].
  104: legacy_tests() ->
  105:     [tls_client_tls10_server,
  106:      tls_client_tls11_server,
  107:      tls_client_tls12_server,
  108:      tls10_client_tls_server,
  109:      tls11_client_tls_server,
  110:      tls12_client_tls_server].
  111: 
  112: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  113:     catch crypto:stop(),
  114:     try crypto:start() of
  115: 	ok ->
  116:             case ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support('tlsv1.3') of                
  117:                 true ->
  118:                     ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  119:                     [{client_type, erlang}, {server_type, erlang} | 
  120:                      Config];
  121:                 false ->
  122:                     {skip, "Insufficient crypto support for TLS-1.3"}
  123:             end
  124:     catch _:_ ->
  125: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  126:     end.
  127: 
  128: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  129:     ssl:stop(),
  130:     application:stop(crypto).
  131: 
  132: init_per_group(rsa, Config0) ->
  133:     Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0),
  134:     COpts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  135:     SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  136:     [{client_type, erlang},
  137:      {server_type, erlang},{client_cert_opts, COpts}, {server_cert_opts, SOpts} | 
  138:      lists:delete(server_cert_opts, lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))];
  139: init_per_group(ecdsa, Config0) ->
  140:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  141:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso 
  142:         (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse lists:member(dh, PKAlg)) of
  143:         true ->
  144:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_ecdsa_cert(Config0),
  145:             COpts = proplists:get_value(client_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  146:             SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  147:             [{client_type, erlang},
  148:              {server_type, erlang},{client_cert_opts, COpts}, {server_cert_opts, SOpts} | 
  149:              lists:delete(server_cert_opts, lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))];
  150:         false ->
  151:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  152:     end.
  153: 
  154: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  155:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  156: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  157: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  158: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  159: 
  160: tls13_client_tls12_server() ->
  161:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.2 server."}].
  162: 
  163: tls13_client_tls12_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  164:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']} |
  165:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  166:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2']},
  167:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  168:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  169:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  170: 
  171: 
  172:     
  173: tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server() ->
  174:      [{doc,"Test basic connection between TLS 1.2 server and TLS 1.3 client when " 
  175:        "client has TLS 1.3 specific extensions"}].
  176: 
  177: tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server(Config) ->
  178:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
  179:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
  180: 
  181:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  182:                   {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  183:                   {signature_algs, [rsa_pss_rsae_sha256,
  184:                                     {sha256, rsa},
  185:                                     {sha256, ecdsa},
  186:                                     {sha, ecdsa}]}| ServerOpts0],
  187:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
  188:                   {signature_algs_cert, [ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
  189:                                          ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
  190:                                          rsa_pss_rsae_sha256,
  191:                                          rsa_pkcs1_sha256,
  192:                                          ecdsa_sha1]}|ClientOpts0],
  193:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  194:    
  195: tls12_client_tls13_server() ->
  196:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 client can connect to a TLS 1.3 server."}].
  197: 
  198: tls12_client_tls13_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->    
  199:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2']} |
  200:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  201:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
  202:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  203:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  204:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  205: 
  206: tls_client_tls10_server() ->
  207:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0-1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.0 server."}].
  208: tls_client_tls10_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  209:     CCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  210:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  211:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  212:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  213:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),        
  214:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  215:                   {ciphers, CCiphers} |
  216:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  217:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1']},
  218:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  219:                    {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1')}
  220:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  221:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  222: 
  223: tls_client_tls11_server() ->
  224:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0-1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.1 server."}].
  225: tls_client_tls11_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  226:     CCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  227:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  228:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  229:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  230:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),    
  231:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  232:                    ['tlsv1', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  233:                   {ciphers, CCiphers} |
  234:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  235:     ServerOpts =  [{versions,['tlsv1.1']},
  236:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  237:                    {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.1')}  
  238:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  239:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  240: 
  241: tls_client_tls12_server() ->
  242:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0-1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.2 server."}].
  243: tls_client_tls12_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  244:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  245:                    ['tlsv1', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']} |
  246:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  247:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  248:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  249:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  250:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  251: 
  252: tls10_client_tls_server() ->
  253:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0 client can connect to a TLS 1.0-1.3 server."}].
  254: tls10_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  255:     SCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  256:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  257:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  258:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  259:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),    
  260:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1']},
  261:                   {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1')} |
  262:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  263:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  264:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  265:                    {ciphers, SCiphers} |
  266:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  267:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  268: 
  269: tls11_client_tls_server() ->
  270:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.1 client can connect to a TLS 1.0-1.3 server."}].
  271: tls11_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  272:     SCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  273:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  274:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  275:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  276:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),
  277:     
  278:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.1']},
  279:                   {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.1')} |
  280:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  281:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  282:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  283:                    {ciphers, SCiphers} |
  284:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  285:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  286: 
  287: tls12_client_tls_server() ->
  288:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 client can connect to a TLS 1.0-1.3 server."}].
  289: tls12_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  290:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  291:                    ['tlsv1.2']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  292:     ServerOpts =  [{versions,
  293:                    ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  294:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true} |
  295:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  296:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  297: 
  298: legacy_tls12_client_tls_server() ->
  299:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 client can connect to a TLS 1.3 server."}].
  300: 
  301: legacy_tls12_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  302:     SHA = ssl_test_lib:appropriate_sha(crypto:supports()),
  303:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2']}, {signature_algs, [{SHA, rsa}, {SHA, ecdsa}]} |
  304:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  305:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
  306:                    {signature_algs, ssl:signature_algs(default, 'tlsv1.3')},
  307:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  308:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  309:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  310: 
  311: legacy_tls12_server_tls_client() ->
  312:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 enabled client can connect to legacy TLS-1.2 server."}].
  313: 
  314: legacy_tls12_server_tls_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  315:     SHA = sha384,
  316:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  317:     Alg = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  318:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0, 
  319:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(Alg, [{server_chain,
  320:                                                                                [[{digest, SHA}],
  321:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}],
  322:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}]]},
  323:                                                                               {client_chain,
  324:                                                                                [[{digest, SHA}],
  325:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}],
  326:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}]]}
  327:                                                                              ]),
  328: 
  329:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']} | ClientOpts0],
  330:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']}, {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  331:                    {signature_algs, [{SHA, Alg}]}
  332:                   | ServerOpts0],
  333:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  334: 
  335: middle_box_tls13_client() ->
  336:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 client can connect to a 1.3 server with and without middle box compatible mode."}].
  337: middle_box_tls13_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  338:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  339:                    ['tlsv1.3']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  340:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} |
  341:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  342:     middlebox_test(true, not_empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  343:     middlebox_test(false, empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  344: 
  345: middle_box_tls12_enabled_client() ->
  346:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 enabled client can connect to a TLS 1.3 server with and without middle box compatible mode."}].
  347: middle_box_tls12_enabled_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  348:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  349:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} |
  350:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  351:     middlebox_test(true, not_empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  352:     middlebox_test(false, empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  353: 
  354: middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused() ->
  355:     [{doc, "Test that TLS-1.3 middlebox enabled client can reuse TLS-1.2 session when talking to TLS-1.2 server"}].
  356: middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  357:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  358:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
  359:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
  360: 
  361:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  362: 					{from, self()},
  363:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  364:                                         {options, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']} | ServerOpts]}]),
  365:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  366:     {_Client, CSock} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  367:                                                   {host, Hostname},
  368:                                                   {from, self()},
  369:                                                   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  370:                                                   {options,
  371:                                                    [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']}, {reuse_sessions, save}| ClientOpts]}]),
  372:     Server ! listen,
  373:     {ok,[{session_id, SessionId}, {session_data, SessData}]} = ssl:connection_information(CSock, [session_id, session_data]),
  374:     {_Client1, CSock1}  = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket,
  375:                                                      {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  376:                                                      {host, Hostname},
  377:                                                      {from, self()},
  378:                                                      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  379:                                                      {options,
  380:                                                       [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
  381:                                                        {middlebox_comp_mode, true},
  382:                                                        {reuse_session, {SessionId, SessData}} | ClientOpts]}]),
  383:     {ok,[{session_id, SessionId}]}  = ssl:connection_information(CSock1, [session_id]).
  384: 
  385: renegotiate_error() ->
  386:     [{doc, "Test that an error is returned when ssl:renegotiate/1 is called on a connection running TLS-1.3"}].
  387: renegotiate_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  388:     {_ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  389:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
  390:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
  391: 
  392:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  393: 					{from, self()},
  394:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  395:                                         {options, [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} | ServerOpts]}]),
  396:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  397:     Options = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} | ClientOpts],
  398:     case ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, Options) of
  399:         {ok, Socket} ->
  400:             {error, notsup} = ssl:renegotiate(Socket);
  401:         {error, Reason} ->
  402:             ct:fail(Reason)
  403:     end.
  404: 
  405: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  406: %% Internal functions and callbacks -----------------------------------
  407: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  408: 
  409: middlebox_test(Mode, Expected, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config) ->
  410:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  411:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  412: 					{from, self()},
  413:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, check_session_id, [Expected]}},
  414:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
  415:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  416:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  417: 					{host, Hostname},
  418:                                         {from, self()},
  419:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, check_session_id, [Expected]}},
  420:                                         {options,
  421:                                          [{middlebox_comp_mode, Mode}| ClientOpts]}]),
  422:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
  423: 
  424: check_session_id(Socket, Expected) ->
  425:    {ok, [{session_id, SessionId}]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [session_id]),
  426:     case {Expected, SessionId} of
  427:         {empty, <<>>} ->
  428:             ok;
  429:         {not_empty, SessionId} when SessionId =/= <<>> ->
  430:             ok;
  431:         _ ->
  432:             {nok, {{expected, Expected}, {got, SessionId}}}
